title: Discover the companies of the LLEDO group
subtitle: A collective of 5 complementary entities to cover all your industrial engineering needs

list.name: MPEB
list.description: Core entity of the group since 1989, MPEB specializes in 3, 4 and 5-axis precision machining, complex mechanical part manufacturing and mechanical assembly for aerospace and defense sectors.
expertise: Unit parts and small series manufacturing

list.name: EGI
list.description: EGI provides technical design expertise, structural calculations and custom solution development. Our engineering office supports clients from initial concept through final product validation.
expertise: Structural calculations and material strength analysis

list.name: FREM
list.description: FREM delivers preventive and corrective maintenance, on-site equipment installation and technical support. Our teams work at client facilities to ensure equipment availability and performance.
expertise: Preventive and corrective industrial equipment maintenance
Periodic inspections and regulatory compliance checks

list.name: MGP
list.description: MGP complements the group's offering with sheet metal, boilermaking, welding and mechanical assembly capabilities. Based in Saint-Bauzille-de-Putois, MGP brings complementary expertise across diversified markets with 50 years of experience.

list.name: LLEDO Aerotools
list.description: Division dedicated to developing and marketing GSE (Ground Support Equipment) for light helicopters. Towbars, lifting trolleys and specialized tooling compliant with aeronautical standards.

cta.title: Need a complete industrial partner?
cta.subtitle: Contact us to discuss your project and discover how our expertise can meet your needs.

mpeb.seoDescription: Precision machining specialist for aerospace. 3, 4 and 5-axis machining, high-precision turning and milling.
mpeb.ctaDescription: Our MPEB team is at your disposal to meet your precision machining needs.

egi.seoDescription: Engineering office specialized in mechanical design, structural calculations and custom solutions development.
egi.ctaDescription: Our EGI team is at your disposal to meet your engineering needs.

frem.seoDescription: Preventive and corrective maintenance, on-site equipment installation and technical support for industry.
frem.ctaDescription: Our FREM team is at your disposal to meet your maintenance needs.

mgp.seoDescription: Specialist in sheet metal, boilermaking, welding and mechanical assembly.
mgp.ctaDescription: Our MGP team is at your disposal to meet your sheet metal and boilermaking needs.
